features.name: Express API Platform
features.description: Bootstraps the Express server with CORS, health checks, error handling, and shared middleware around the REST entry points.

features.name: Catalogue Upload & Job Tracking
features.description: Accepts dress image uploads, validates payloads, and exposes endpoints to create catalogue jobs, poll status, download items, and manage user history.

features.name: Video Generation Orchestration
features.description: Runs Bull queue workers that call AI generation services, persist produced media, update progress, and surface public download paths.

features.name: Trend Analytics & Caching
features.description: Validates trend filters, fetches analytics from an external client, and caches summarized datasets for faster repeat queries.

features.name: Data Infrastructure & Utilities
features.description: Initializes PostgreSQL connections, performs migrations, prepares upload directories, and offers filesystem helpers shared across services.

features.name: Catalogue Generator Experience
features.description: Frontend flow for uploading images, triggering generation, and presenting catalogue results with filtering and download actions.

features.name: Trend Analyzer Dashboard
features.description: Interactive analytics view with demographic filters, cached API access, and chart visualizations of trend metrics.

features.name: Product Preview Interface
features.description: Marketing-oriented preview page and shared layout components that showcase the AI catalogue and trend features.
